title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 169.5 - Matching of grants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 169.5 - Matching of grants

State Regulations

For purposes of matching State grants as required by

Education Law, section 3032(4)(a), and subject to the approval of the
commissioner, local education agencies may use other State funds, local funds, Federal funds, and cash and in-kind services provided by business, industry, or
other organizations to support a particular training project. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
169.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
